channel.title: CVE Feed for wpdevteam -- ReviewX – Multi-criteria Rating & Reviews for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpdevteam -- ReviewX – Multi-criteria Rating & Reviews for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2023-2833|2024-08-02T06:33:05.515Z -- wpdevteam -- reviewx%20%E2%80%93%20multi-criteria%20rating%20%26%20reviews%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The ReviewX plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in versions up to, and including, 1.6.13 due to insufficient restriction on the 'rx_set_screen_options' function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with minimal permissions such as a subscriber, to modify their user role by supplying the 'wp_screen_options[option]' and 'wp_screen_options[value]' parameters during a screen option update.
